metadata.title: CVE-2023-52669 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: crypto:s390/aes - Fix buffer overread in CTR mode When processing the last block,the s390 ctr code will always read a whole block, even if there isn't awhole block of data left. Fix this by using the actual length left and copyit into a buffer first for processing.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
